import { useState } from "react"; export const CreateItem = () => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ title: '', category: '', maxLevel: '', imageUrl: '', summary: '', }) const onChangeHandler = (e) => { setValues(state => ({...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() onCreateGameSubmit(values) } return (

Create item
